eventDescription: Welcome to build2learn - Where Innovation Meets Community! Imagine a hackathon, but with a twist!🤔 It's not just about building incredible micro products; it's about forging lifelong connections with like-minded individuals who share your passion for innovation! 🤝💡At build2learn, we believe that magic happens when engineers come together to do what they love - BUILD!, Are you someone with a side project that you've been dreaming of bringing to life? build2learn is your chance to turn that dream into reality! ⏰🌟 Are you a student eager to create something extraordinary but in need of mentors to guide you? build2learn is the launchpad you've been waiting for! 🎓🚀 Or maybe you're someone who thrives on helping others unleash their full potential? build2learn is the perfect platform to make a lasting impact! 🤗 Join us at build2learn and embark on a journey of creation, collaboration, and camaraderie! 🌟 See you there!🌆

CTOtalk Annual Summit 2025 is happening on October 25 at ITC Grand Chola, Chennai. Join 1000+ CTOs, CDOs, VPs, and engineering leaders from India's top tech companies as they share real-world AI strategies, challenges, and innovations. Expect deep-dive tech sessions, unfiltered peer insights, and a gathering of leaders building the future. Early bird registration closing soon!
D3 Community Meetup #04: Join a vibrant in-person community for Software Engineers focused on Full Stack, DevOps, Cloud & AI. Learn, network, and grow!
eventVenue: YuniQ, Ticel Bio Park - Phase 2, Taramani
